trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the delimiter for a blob listing operation.
trans-unit.target: Gets or sets the delimiter for a blob listing operation.

trans-unit.source: The delimiter to use to traverse the virtual hierarchy of blobs.
trans-unit.target: The delimiter to use to traverse the virtual hierarchy of blobs.

trans-unit.source: The delimiter parameter enables the caller to traverse the blob namespace by using a user-configured delimiter.
trans-unit.target: The delimiter parameter enables the caller to traverse the blob namespace by using a user-configured delimiter.

trans-unit.source: Using this parameter, it is possible to traverse a virtual hierarchy of blobs as though it were a file system.
trans-unit.target: Using this parameter, it is possible to traverse a virtual hierarchy of blobs as though it were a file system.
